function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on mobile technology for contact tracing and exposure monitoring","Impact":"Failure to effectively monitor and trace potential exposure to the virus","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust privacy and security measures in mobile apps, alongside public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Mobile contact tracing apps, encryption, and anonymization technologies","People":"General public, healthcare workers, policymakers","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, app developers"},{"Description":"Rapid increase in use of grocery apps and delivery services","Impact":"Strain on supply chains, potential for increased exposure to delivery personnel","Mitigation":"Expansion of delivery network, adherence to strict hygiene and safety protocols, investment in supply chain resilience","Technologies":"Delivery tracking systems, contactless delivery technology, and supply chain management systems","People":"Consumers, delivery personnel, supply chain workers","Owner":"Grocery app companies, logistics companies, government authorities"},{"Description":"Dependence on Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and GPS for contact identification","Impact":"Inaccuracy in contact identification, reliance on technology with potential limitations","Mitigation":"Integration of multiple data sources, validation of identified contacts through testing and health data analysis","Technologies":"Data integration platforms, advanced analytics algorithms, IoT sensors","People":"General public, healthcare workers, policymakers","Owner":"Health authorities, app developers, technology providers"}]}
